title: Donald Trump says he will nominate Federal Reserve chair in ‘early’ 2026
description: US president touts frontrunner Kevin Hassett as ‘potential’ new head of the US central bank
content: Donald Trump said he would announce his pick to lead the Federal Reserve early next year, as he touted Kevin Hassett, the top White House economic official, as the potential new head of the US centra… [+2788 chars]
